entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:26 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
